abstract: Report by Federal Bureau of Investigation 9/11 Review Commission says bureau has made good progress since Sept 11 terror attacks but strongly needs to better its intelligence capabilities and hire more linguists, tech experts and informants; says it still lags in countering evolving terrorist threats.
lead_paragraph: The bureau needs to improve intelligence capabilities and hire more linguists, said the report, which looked at progress since the Sept. 11 attacks.

headline.main: Report Credits F.B.I. With Progress Since 9/11, but Says More Is Needed
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Still Lags in Countering Evolving Terrorist Threats, Report Says

snippet: The bureau needs to improve intelligence capabilities and hire more linguists, said the report, which looked at progress since the Sept. 11 attacks.

keywords.value: National Commission on Terrorist Attacks upon the United States
keywords.name: organizations
